Installation¶

After you’ve built a gage, it’s time to bring it to life.

Update the distro¶

Initially you should upgrade the distro to the latest Debian release. Follow the steps from beagleboard.org.

Initial setup¶

Continue to follow the initial setup steps from beagleboard.org until you have an ssh session.

  1. Setup a new user
  2. Add user to sudoers

Magic - aka Fabric¶

Then we use a tool called fabric. If you don’t already have it you can brew install fabric, sudo apt-get install fabric, or pip install fabric. For more info see fabfile.org
